name: CVE-2022-42119
description: Certain Liferay products are vulnerable to Cross Site Scripting (XSS) via the Commerce module. This affects Liferay Portal 7.3.5 through 7.4.2 and Liferay DXP 7.3 before update 8.
pattern: [(software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:liferay:liferay_portal:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:liferay:dxp:7.3:-:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:liferay:dxp:7.3:update_1:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:liferay:dxp:7.3:update_2:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:liferay:dxp:7.3:update_3:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:liferay:dxp:7.3:update_4:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:liferay:dxp:7.3:update_5:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:liferay:dxp:7.3:update_6:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:liferay:dxp:7.3:update_7:*:*:*:*:*:*')]
